question: Kindly give us meanings of the following names: Jamshaid, & Misha. Jazakallah khair.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Jamshed - the name of an ancient Persian King who have commissioned the
crafting of a bowl wherein he could see all he wishes, hence, the name,
Jamshed, meaning literally drowned / lost in a bowl. (Ferozul Lugaat).

Misha - literally means soft kid skin. (Ibid).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
